translations: 司仪神父；主持仪式的人；主持弥撒的教父

sentences.sentence: Celebrant: Let us lift up our hearts!
sentences.translation: 礼：让我们举起我们的心！

sentences.sentence: Festvial are meant to celebrant important times of year.
sentences.translation: 节日的目的在于庆祝一年中重要的时刻。

sentences.sentence: If there is only one deacon, he takes his place at the right of the celebrant.
sentences.translation: 如果只有一个执事，他考虑他的位置在右边的礼。
